original_text: Abraham also believed God. When God told him to leave his home, he obeyed God. He left his home to go to another country, but he did not know where he was going. It was the place that God had promised to give to Abraham.
korean_text: 믿음으로 아브라함은 부르심을 받았을 때에 순종하여 장래의 유업으로 받을 땅에 나아갈새 갈 바를 알지 못하고 나아갔으며

sentences.original_text: When God told him to leave his home,
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그에게 집을 떠나라고 말했을 때,

sentences.original_text: He left his home to go to another country,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 나라로 가기 위해 집을 떠났습니다.

sentences.original_text: but he did not know where he was going.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 어디로 가고 있는지 알지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: that God had promised to give to Abraham.
